I graduated cum laude for my Masters degree in Business Administration (Small Business & Entrepeneurship) and a have a Bachelor degree in Business Economics. In 2018 I followed bootcamp in fullstack Web Development and learned to work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.JS and databases. My goal is to become a better programmer by practicing as much as I can. You can read my blog.
